flowers.title: Lisianthus
flowers.info: Lisianthus is a delicate flower with ruffled petals and comes in various colors, symbolizing appreciation and gratitude.

flowers.title: Protea
flowers.info: Protea is a unique flower native to South Africa, known for its striking appearance and representing courage and transformation.

flowers.title: Anemone
flowers.info: Anemone is a dainty flower with vibrant petals and a dark center, symbolizing anticipation and protection against evil.

flowers.title: Bleeding Heart
flowers.info: Bleeding Heart is a heart-shaped flower with drooping petals, representing deep emotions and unrequited love.

flowers.title: Bird of Paradise
flowers.info: Bird of Paradise is an exotic flower with vibrant colors and unique shape, symbolizing joy, freedom, and paradise.
